name: bigdata
excerpt: Choose your big data solution for the most streamlined approach to utilizing these tools to further bolster your business.

bundles.name: Hadoop Core Batch Processing
bundles.summary: Run a standard Mapreduce job using the hadoop core batch processing solution.

bundles.name: High Performance Batch Processing
bundles.summary: For higher performance run your native mapreduce application on top of Tez.

bundles.summary: Analyse unstructured data analytics with Pig
